title: VirtualAction
contents:
mode_edit code
API / rxjs/index

VirtualActionlink

class VirtualAction<T> extends AsyncAction<T> { constructor(scheduler: VirtualTimeScheduler, work: (this: SchedulerAction<T>, state?: T) => void, index: number = (scheduler.index += 1)) protected active: boolean protected scheduler: VirtualTimeScheduler protected work: (this: SchedulerAction<T>, state?: T) => void protected index: number schedule(state?: T, delay: number = 0): Subscription protected requestAsyncId(scheduler: VirtualTimeScheduler, id?: any, delay: number = 0): TimerHandle protected recycleAsyncId(scheduler: VirtualTimeScheduler, id?: any, delay: number = 0): TimerHandle | undefined protected _execute(state: T, delay: number): any }

构造函数link

constructor(scheduler: VirtualTimeScheduler, work: (this: SchedulerAction<T>, state?: T) => void, index: number = (scheduler.index += 1))

参数

scheduler VirtualTimeScheduler
work (this: SchedulerAction<T>, state?: T) => void
index number

可选。默认值为 (scheduler.index += 1)。

属性link

属性类型说明
active
scheduler 声明于构造函数中。
work 声明于构造函数中。
index 声明于构造函数中。

可选。默认值为 undefined。
delay number

可选。默认值为 0。

Subscription
